thank-you-message: Thank you for visiting us at Secret Sauce Summit 2023 and took part in our survey
opening-message: This is <blue>not a coincodence</blue> that you ended up here.
opening-message-two: One stop solution for your organization's net zero journey <blue>begins here.</blue>
what-are-you-getting: Today you received <blue>Eucalyptus seed</blue> as the token of our appreciation.
what-are-you-getting-two: We believe that <blue>Action speaks louder than words</blue> and our world needs help more than ever.
what-are-you-getting-three: Please plant the seed and <blue>Here's how.</blue>
what-are-you-getting-four: Please nurture the seed and <blue>watch it grow</blue> little by little.
what-are-you-getting-five: If the seed is planted and grown, it is estimated that 1 tree will capture <blue>34 kg of CO2 annually.</blue>
what-are-you-getting-six: We will need <blue>135 trees or 3/4 Rai</blue> to capture the equivalent of an emission from 1 passenger car annually.
what-are-you-getting-seven: The effect of each individual is <blue>small</blue> so we need the whole world to work together.
what-are-you-getting-eight: Please join us in accelerating the change towards a <blue>better future</blue> through our Expert Decision platform and One stop solution for your organizationâ€™s sustainability journey.
